QueenMod:DignifiedSlap.NAME: Dignified Slap
QueenMod:DignifiedSlap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Strength this turn only.

QueenMod:AttackOrder.NAME: Attack Order
QueenMod:AttackOrder.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL queenmod:Recruit a Hornet.

QueenMod:DefendOrder.NAME: Defend Order
QueenMod:DefendOrder.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL queenmod:Recruit a queenmod:Bumblebee.

QueenMod:MosquitoPlatoon.NAME: Mosquito Platoon
QueenMod:MosquitoPlatoon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage two times. NL Gain queenmod:Nectar equal to the damage dealt.

QueenMod:GatheringSwarm.NAME: Gathering Swarm
QueenMod:GatheringSwarm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, spend !M! queenmod:Nectar to gain !M! queenmod:Swarm.

QueenMod:HexGuard.NAME: Hex Guard
QueenMod:HexGuard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Spend 5 queenmod:Nectar: Gain !B! Block.

QueenMod:HoneycombSmash.NAME: Honeycomb Smash
QueenMod:HoneycombSmash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Spend 10 queenmod:Nectar: Apply !M! Weak.

QueenMod:Draft.NAME: Draft
QueenMod:Draft.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! queenmod:Drones to your Draw Pile.

QueenMod:Assimilate.NAME: Assimilate
QueenMod:Assimilate.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all queenmod:Hive cards in your hand. NL Gain !M! queenmod:Swarm for each.

QueenMod:BuildOrder.NAME: Build Order
QueenMod:BuildOrder.DESCRIPTION: Recruit 2 queenmod:Workerbees. NL At the start of your turn, add a queenmod:Workerbee from your draw pile to your hand.

QueenMod:KillerQueen.NAME: Killer Queen
QueenMod:KillerQueen.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. queenmod:Aggressive: Deals double damage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. queenmod:Aggressive: Deals double damage.

QueenMod:HiveNetwork.NAME: Hive Network
QueenMod:HiveNetwork.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards, For each queenmod:Hive card drawn, gain [E] .

QueenMod:BusyBees.NAME: Busy Bees
QueenMod:BusyBees.DESCRIPTION: Add a copy of all queenmod:Hive cards in your hand to your draw pile, then upgrade the queenmod:Hive cards in your hand.
QueenMod:BusyBees.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a copy of your hand to your draw pile, then upgrade your hand.

QueenMod:Beekeeping.NAME: Beekeeping
QueenMod:Beekeeping.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 card. NL Add a queenmod:Bumblebee to your hand.
QueenMod:Beekeeping.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 card. NL Add an upgraded queenmod:Bumblebee to your hand.

QueenMod:Metamorphosis.NAME: Metamorphosis
QueenMod:Metamorphosis.DESCRIPTION: Replace all queenmod:Drones with queenmod:Hornets, queenmod:Bumblebees, or queenmod:Workerbees.

QueenMod:Nourish.NAME: Nourish
QueenMod:Nourish.DESCRIPTION: Spend 10 queenmod:Nectar: Recover !M! Health. NL Exhaust.

QueenMod:HornetSwarm.NAME: Hornet Swarm
QueenMod:HornetSwarm.DESCRIPTION: Play all Hornets in your Hand and Draw Pile. NL Exhaust.
QueenMod:HornetSwarm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play all Hornets in your Hand and Draw Pile.

QueenMod:WarBuzz.NAME: War Buzz
QueenMod:WarBuzz.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all Skills in your hand, replace them with Hornets.

QueenMod:ChainStrike.NAME: Chain strike
QueenMod:ChainStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you've played !M! or more cards this turn, draw a card and gain [E] .

QueenMod:ProtectQueen.NAME: Protect The Queen!
QueenMod:ProtectQueen.DESCRIPTION: When you would take attack damage, Exhaust a queenmod:Bumblebee from your draw pile to gain its Block. NL queenmod:Recruit 2 queenmod:Bumblebees.
QueenMod:ProtectQueen.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you would take attack damage, Discard a queenmod:Bumblebee from your draw pile to gain its Block. NL queenmod:Recruit 2 queenmod:Bumblebees.

QueenMod:SharpStingers.NAME: Sharper Stingers
QueenMod:SharpStingers.DESCRIPTION: Hornets do !M! more damage. NL queenmod:Recruit 2 Hornets.

QueenMod:EnergyReserves.NAME: Stockpile
QueenMod:EnergyReserves.DESCRIPTION: At the start of the turn, spend 10 queenmod:Nectar to gain [E]. NL queenmod:Recruit 2 queenmod:Workerbees.

QueenMod:Repurpose.NAME: Repurpose
QueenMod:Repurpose.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all queenmod:Drones in your hand and draw pile. Gain 1 queenmod:Production for each.

QueenMod:Mark.NAME: Mark
QueenMod:Mark.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable, !M! queenmod:Pollinate and your queenmod:Swarm for the turn.

QueenMod:SwarmTactics.NAME: Swarm Tactics
QueenMod:SwarmTactics.DESCRIPTION: When you play a card this turn, gain !M! queenmod:Swarm.

QueenMod:StrategicGenius.NAME: Strategic Genius
QueenMod:StrategicGenius.DESCRIPTION: When you draw a card this turn, gain 1 Strength this turn only.

QueenMod:OverwhelmingForce.NAME: Overwhelming Force
QueenMod:OverwhelmingForce.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to all enemies equal to the number of cards in your draw pile.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies (Equal to the number of cards in your deck).

QueenMod:Flyby.NAME: Flyby
QueenMod:Flyby.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Add this card to your draw pile instead of your discard pile.

QueenMod:PerfectLanding.NAME: Perfect Landing
QueenMod:PerfectLanding.DESCRIPTION: queenmod:Finisher. NL If you've played 5 or more cards this turn, gain !B! block.

QueenMod:SplitStrike.NAME: Split Strike
QueenMod:SplitStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Recall half your queenmod:Swarm for the turn.

QueenMod:Feast.NAME: Feast
QueenMod:Feast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. If this kills an enemy, gain !M! queenmod:Swarm.

QueenMod:DroneSpawner.NAME: Drone Spawner
QueenMod:DroneSpawner.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a queenmod:Drone to your draw pile.

QueenMod:CrossGuard.NAME: Cross-guard
QueenMod:CrossGuard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each Attack in your hand.

QueenMod:TakeFlight.NAME: Take Flight
QueenMod:TakeFlight.DESCRIPTION: Gain queenmod:Flight. Lose 3 queenmod:Nectar at the end of your turn or lose queenmod:Flight.

QueenMod:Anticipate.NAME: Anticipate
QueenMod:Anticipate.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, add a queenmod:Bumblebee to your hand. Otherwise add a queenmod:Hornet to your hand.
QueenMod:Anticipate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, add an Upgraded queenmod:Bumblebee to your hand. Otherwise add an Upgraded queenmod:Hornet to your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: queenmod:Recruit a queenmod:Bumblebee and add it to your hand.
queenmod:Recruit a queenmod:Hornet and add it to your hand.
queenmod:Recruit a queenmod:Workerbee and add it to your hand.
Gain !B! block. Add a Drone to your hand.

QueenMod:MilitaryHandbook.NAME: Military Handbook
QueenMod:MilitaryHandbook.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Spend 10 queenmod:Nectar: Attacks in your hand cost 1 less this turn. NL Exhaust.

QueenMod:PollenBlast.NAME: Pollen Blast
QueenMod:PollenBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and inflict !M! queenmod:Pollinate to all enemies.
QueenMod:PollenBlast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and inflict !M! queenmod:Pollinate to all enemies.

QueenMod:BlindingSwarm.NAME: Blinding Swarm
QueenMod:BlindingSwarm.DESCRIPTION: If you have queenmod:Swarm, Apply !M! Weak to all enemies. NL Split your queenmod:Swarm among all enemies for the turn.

QueenMod:SecretWeapon.NAME: Secret Weapon
QueenMod:SecretWeapon.DESCRIPTION: Spend all queenmod:Nectar: Deal triple that amount to an enemy. NL Ethereal.
QueenMod:SecretWeapon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Spend all queenmod:Nectar: Deal triple that amount to an enemy.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Spend all Nectar: Deal !D! damage. (Triple the Nectar spent) NL Ethereal.
Spend all Nectar: Deal !D! damage. (Triple the Nectar spent)

QueenMod:GeneralForm.NAME: General Form
QueenMod:GeneralForm.DESCRIPTION: When you play a card, spend 5 queenmod:Nectar to gain [E] . NL Ethereal.
QueenMod:GeneralForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you play a card, spend 5 queenmod:Nectar to gain [E] .

QueenMod:InspiringStrike.NAME: Inspiring Strike
QueenMod:InspiringStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Upgrade a random card in your draw pile.
QueenMod:InspiringStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Upgrade !M! random cards in your draw pile.

QueenMod:HornetCommander.NAME: Hornet Commander
QueenMod:HornetCommander.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Upgrade all queenmod:Hornets in your draw pile.

QueenMod:BumbleBeeCommander.NAME: Bumblebee Commander
QueenMod:BumbleBeeCommander.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Upgrade all queenmod:Bumblebees in your draw pile.

QueenMod:DroneCommander.NAME: Drone Commander
QueenMod:DroneCommander.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade all queenmod:Drones in your draw pile. NL Draw a card.
QueenMod:DroneCommander.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Upgrade all queenmod:Drones in your draw pile. NL Draw 2 cards.

QueenMod:WorkerBeeCommander.NAME: Worker Bee Commander
QueenMod:WorkerBeeCommander.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Inflict !M! queenmod:Pollinate. NL Upgrade all queenmod:Workerbees in your draw pile.

QueenMod:EliteSoldiers.NAME: Elite Soldiers
QueenMod:EliteSoldiers.DESCRIPTION: Add a Hornet, Bumblebee and Workerbee to your draw pile. NL Upgrade all queenmod:Hive cards in your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
QueenMod:EliteSoldiers.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a Hornet, Bumblebee and Workerbee to your draw pile. NL Upgrade all queenmod:Hive cards in your draw pile.

QueenMod:Knighting.NAME: Knighting
QueenMod:Knighting.DESCRIPTION: Add a queenmod:Hive card in your hand to your deck permanently. NL Exhaust.
QueenMod:Knighting.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a queenmod:Hive card in your hand to your deck permanently. NL Gain 5 Block. NL Exhaust.

QueenMod:Lunge.NAME: Lunge
QueenMod:Lunge.DESCRIPTION: If the last card you played was a skill, deal !D! damage !M! times.

QueenMod:Parry.NAME: Parry
QueenMod:Parry.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Apply 1 Vulnerable. NL Add a queenmod:Riposte to your hand.
QueenMod:Parry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Apply 1 Vulnerable. NL Add a queenmod:Riposte+ to your hand.

QueenMod:Riposte.NAME: Riposte
QueenMod:Riposte.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Ethereal. NL Exhaust.

QueenMod:FinishingBlow.NAME: Finishing Blow
QueenMod:FinishingBlow.DESCRIPTION: queenmod:Finisher. NL If you've played 10 or more cards this turn, deal !D! damage.

QueenMod:Ambush.NAME: Ambush
QueenMod:Ambush.DESCRIPTION: X random cards in your draw pile cost 0 until played.
QueenMod:Ambush.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: X+1 random cards in your draw pile cost 0 until played.

QueenMod:Charge.NAME: Charge!
QueenMod:Charge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 2 cards.

QueenMod:Spearhead.NAME: Spearhead
QueenMod:Spearhead.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Spend 5 queenmod:Nectar: Deal !M! damage to all enemies.

QueenMod:Conscripts.NAME: Conscripts
QueenMod:Conscripts.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card. NL When you add this to your deck, add two additional copies.

QueenMod:Recruit.NAME: Recruit
QueenMod:Recruit.DESCRIPTION: queenmod:Recruit a queenmod:Hornet. NL queenmod:Recruit a queenmod:Bumblebee

QueenMod:KillerBee.NAME: Killer Bee
QueenMod:KillerBee.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL While this is in your draw pile, at the start of your turn, increase this card's damage by #b8.
QueenMod:KillerBee.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL While this is in your draw pile, at the start of your turn, increase this card's damage by #b10.

QueenMod:FlankingStrike.NAME: Flanking Strike
QueenMod:FlankingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies. NL Exhaust.

QueenMod:Reinforcements.NAME: Reinforcements
QueenMod:Reinforcements.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a queenmod:Hornet or queenmod:Bumblebee from your draw pile.

QueenMod:Regroup.NAME: Regroup
QueenMod:Regroup.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Shuffle your discard pile into your deck.

QueenMod:WarTrumpet.NAME: War Trumpet
QueenMod:WarTrumpet.DESCRIPTION: When you play an Attack this turn, gain 1 Block and add a queenmod:Drone to your Draw Pile.

QueenMod:HonorGuard.NAME: Honor Guards
QueenMod:HonorGuard.DESCRIPTION: Add 3 queenmod:Bumblebees to your hand. NL Exhaust.
QueenMod:HonorGuard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Add 3 queenmod:Bumblebees to your hand. NL Exhaust.

QueenMod:HoneyFactory.NAME: Honey Factory
QueenMod:HoneyFactory.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. When drawn, discard to gain !M! queenmod:Nectar and draw a card.

QueenMod:HoneyShield.NAME: Honey Shield
QueenMod:HoneyShield.DESCRIPTION: When you gain queenmod:Nectar, gain !M! block.

QueenMod:Reposition.NAME: Reposition
QueenMod:Reposition.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Strength this turn only. NL queenmod:Recruit a Hornet. NL Gain 3 Block.

QueenMod:FullRetreat.NAME: Full Retreat
QueenMod:FullRetreat.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle your hand into your draw pile.

QueenMod:Fortify.NAME: Fortify
QueenMod:Fortify.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block for each queenmod:Hive card in your draw pile.

QueenMod:HoldPosition.NAME: Hold Position
QueenMod:HoldPosition.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. Add 2 queenmod:Drones to your draw pile.

QueenMod:Garrison.NAME: Garrison
QueenMod:Garrison.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! queenmod:Drones to your draw pile. NL queenmod:Recruit !QueenMod:second! queenmod:Bumblebees.

QueenMod:Multiply.NAME: Multiply
QueenMod:Multiply.DESCRIPTION: Add a copy of each queenmod:Hive card in your draw pile to your draw pile.

QueenMod:Fleche.NAME: Fleche
QueenMod:Fleche.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust two random skills in your draw pile.

QueenMod:AggressionPolicy.NAME: Aggression Policy
QueenMod:AggressionPolicy.DESCRIPTION: queenmod:Aggressive: Attacks are played once more.

QueenMod:MatingDance.NAME: Mating Dance
QueenMod:MatingDance.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL While in your hand, complete a queenmod:Dance to gain !M! queenmod:Swarm.

QueenMod:OverwhelmingPower.NAME: Overwhelming Power
QueenMod:OverwhelmingPower.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain [E] for every 10 cards in your draw pile.

QueenMod:Blitz.NAME: Blitzkreig
QueenMod:Blitz.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

QueenMod:Frenzy.NAME: Frenzy
QueenMod:Frenzy.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block and deal damage to all enemies equal to your queenmod:Swarm and split it among all targets for the turn.
QueenMod:Frenzy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and Deal !D! damage to all enemies (equal to your Swarm) NL Split your queenmod:Swarm among all targets for the turn.

QueenMod:SecretService.NAME: Secret Service
QueenMod:SecretService.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust one of each type of queenmod:Hive card in your draw pile. Combine them into a W.A.S.P. and add it to your hand. NL Exhaust.
QueenMod:SecretService.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust one of each type of queenmod:Hive card in your draw pile. Combine them into a W.A.S.P. upgrade it and add it to your hand. NL Exhaust.

QueenMod:CallToArms.NAME: Call to Arms
QueenMod:CallToArms.DESCRIPTION: Fill your hand with queenmod:Drones. NL Exhaust.
QueenMod:CallToArms.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fill your hand with queenmod:Drones. NL queenmod:Recruit a queenmod:Bumblebee, queenmod:Hornet, and queenmod:Workerbee. NL Exhaust.

QueenMod:TeaTime.NAME: Tea Time
QueenMod:TeaTime.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Spend 10 queenmod:Nectar: Draw 2 cards. NL Costs 1 more for each Attack in your hand.

QueenMod:Leadership.NAME: Leadership
QueenMod:Leadership.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength and Dexterity. NL queenmod:Recruit a queenmod:Hornet and queenmod:Bumblebee.
QueenMod:Leadership.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain 1 Strength and Dexterity. NL queenmod:Recruit a queenmod:Hornet and queenmod:Bumblebee.

QueenMod:Drain.NAME: Mosquito Platoon
QueenMod:Drain.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. Gain queenmod:Nectar equal to damage dealt.

QueenMod:Feint.NAME: Feint
QueenMod:Feint.DESCRIPTION: If the last card played this combat was an Attack, Inflict 1 Weak and draw !M! card
QueenMod:Feint.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If the last card played this combat was an Attack, Inflict 1 Weak and draw !M! cards

QueenMod:IAmTheSwarm.NAME: I Am The Swarm
QueenMod:IAmTheSwarm.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your draw pile, and gain !M! queenmod:Swarm for each card exhausted.

QueenMod:WarMachine.NAME: War Machine
QueenMod:WarMachine.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, if Fatal increase this card's queenmod:Production by 1. NL Gain !M! queenmod:Production.

QueenMod:Ruthless.NAME: Ruthless
QueenMod:Ruthless.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! queenmod:Swarm. Split it among all enemies for the turn.

QueenMod:SwordsToPlowshares.NAME: Swords to Plowshares
QueenMod:SwordsToPlowshares.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! queenmod:Nectar. NL queenmod:Defensive: queenmod:Recruit a Workerbee and gain !B! Block.

QueenMod:ForcedMarch.NAME: Forced March
QueenMod:ForcedMarch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When you play a card this turn, shuffle it into your draw pile instead of your discard pile.
